item.title: Comment on On looking out of the plane window by Ari
item.dc:creator: Ari
item.description: Absolutely beautiful post. I've never spent a flight doing anything other than staring out the window in awe!!! I haven't been on many flights, but flying is by far one of my favourite experiences that life has to offer. We're going to Texas next month and I'm so excited I can hardly contain myself. It's almost a blessing to have to fly in the time of COVID, middle seats being kept open and me flying with my partner means I definitely won't get stuck with an aisle seat :)
item.content:encoded: Absolutely beautiful post. I’ve never spent a flight doing anything other than staring out the window in awe!!! I haven’t been on many flights, but flying is by far one of my favourite experiences that life has to offer. We’re going to Texas next month and I’m so excited I can hardly contain myself. It’s almost a blessing to have to fly in the time of COVID, middle seats being kept open and me flying with my partner means I definitely won’t get stuck with an aisle seat ðŸ™‚

item.title: Comment on Two weeks in Montenegro by Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/two-weeks-montenegro/#comment-254315">Ali</a>.
Hi Ali, no I don't think you could do this trip without a car. We visited some pretty remote spots - the farmstays and hikes - which you wouldn't be able to reach by public transport. It was easy to drive ourselves though, and a fun way to explore the country. Hope you have a good trip!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ali.

Hi Ali, no I don’t think you could do this trip without a car. We visited some pretty remote spots – the farmstays and hikes – which you wouldn’t be able to reach by public transport. It was easy to drive ourselves though, and a fun way to explore the country. Hope you have a good trip!

item.title: Comment on Two weeks in Montenegro by Ali
item.dc:creator: Ali
item.description: Great blog, thank you! Do you think this sort of holiday is possible without a car?
item.content:encoded: Great blog, thank you! Do you think this sort of holiday is possible without a car?

item.title: Comment on A Botswana safari in photos by Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Botswana looks so beautiful, nature, wildlife, sunset, they are all breath taking. Thanks for sharing your moments with us.
item.content:encoded: Botswana looks so beautiful, nature, wildlife, sunset, they are all breath taking. Thanks for sharing your moments with us.

item.title: Comment on On safari in Botswana by Getz destinations
item.dc:creator: Getz destinations
item.description: What an amazing experience of safari, such trips makes people feel alive. I was planning to visit somewhere and you gave me a perfect destination to explore. Thanks for sharing.
item.content:encoded: What an amazing experience of safari, such trips makes people feel alive. I was planning to visit somewhere and you gave me a perfect destination to explore. Thanks for sharing.

item.description: I think Botswana is leading when it comes to Safari in Southen African region
